Docs.summary: Gets the case-normalized route value for the specified route .
Docs.returns: The value corresponding to the key.
Docs.remarks: The casing of a route value in is determined by the client. This making constructing paths for view locations in a case sensitive file system unreliable. Using the to get route values produces consistently cased results.
